doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Hasan Ali is a ENT Specialist in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (ENT). He is a Assistant Professor, ENT at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. Hasan Ali at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra is 3pm to 9pm (Sat to Thu) & 9am to 12pm (Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Ahmad Abdullah Jami
doctor.specialty: ENT (Ear, Nose, Throat) Specialist & Head Neck Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Ahmad Abdullah Jami is a distinguished ENT (Ear, Nose, Throat) Specialist and Head Neck Surgeon in Bogura, holding MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS in ENT & Head-Neck Surgery, and FICS from the USA. He has completed advanced fellowships in Microscopic Ear Surgery from Chennai, Micro-laryngeal Surgery from Pune, and Endoscopic Surgery for Nose, Ear, and Skull-Base from Mumbai and the UAE. As a Consultant in ENT & Head-Neck Surgery at Doctors Clinic, Bogura, Dr. Ahmad Abdullah Jami specializes in the treatment of ear infections, hearing loss, nasal polyps, sinusitis, tonsillitis, thyroid disorders, vocal cord lesions, head-neck tumors, and vertigo. He provides consultations at Doctors Clinic (Unit 2), located at Thanthania Bus Stand, Sherpur Road, Bogura, with visiting hours from 5 pm to 8 pm, except on Fridays.

chamber.address: Thanthania Bus Stand, Sherpur Road, Bogura
